Post.title: Hello World
Post._content:
Welcome to [Hexo](https://hexo.io/)! This is your very first post. Check [documentation](https://hexo.io/docs/) for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in [troubleshooting](https://hexo.io/docs/troubleshooting.html) or you can ask me on [GitHub](https://github.com/hexojs/hexo/issues).

## Quick Start

### Create a new post

``` bash
$ hexo new "My New Post"
```

More info: [Writing](https://hexo.io/docs/writing.html)

### Run server

``` bash
$ hexo server
```

More info: [Server](https://hexo.io/docs/server.html)

### Generate static files

``` bash
$ hexo generate
```

More info: [Generating](https://hexo.io/docs/generating.html)

### Deploy to remote sites

``` bash
$ hexo deploy
```

More info: [Deployment](https://hexo.io/docs/one-command-deployment.html)
Post.raw:

title: Hello World
categories: []
tags: []

Welcome to [Hexo](https://hexo.io/)! This is your very first post. Check [documentation](https://hexo.io/docs/) for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in [troubleshooting](https://hexo.io/docs/troubleshooting.html) or you can ask me on [GitHub](https://github.com/hexojs/hexo/issues).

## Quick Start

### Create a new post

``` bash
$ hexo new "My New Post"
```

More info: [Writing](https://hexo.io/docs/writing.html)

### Run server

``` bash
$ hexo server
```

More info: [Server](https://hexo.io/docs/server.html)

### Generate static files

``` bash
$ hexo generate
```

More info: [Generating](https://hexo.io/docs/generating.html)

### Deploy to remote sites

``` bash
$ hexo deploy
```

More info: [Deployment](https://hexo.io/docs/one-command-deployment.html)

## ## ### cssjssource ### jsdelivr**jsdelivr** ### ``` tale/_config.ymlinject: head: - # Copy tale/_config.stellar.ymlstyle: font-family: body: '"LXGW WenKai Screen", sans-serif' Copy ``` ### ``` tale/_config.ymlinject: head: - - # - # Copy tale/_config.stellar.ymlstyle: font-family: body: 'HarmonyOS_Regular' # #body: 'HarmonyOS_Regular' # Copy ``` ## ### ``` tale/_config.yml# Site title: SFZhang # avatar: /customize/images/sfzhang.jpg # favicon: /customize/images/sfzhang.jpg # subtitle: "SFZhang's blog | blog.sfzhang.cn" # description: '' keywords: author: SFZhang # language: zh-CN #enzh-CN timezone: '' Copy ``` ### ``` tale/_config.stellar.ymlsidebar: menu: post: '[btn.blog](/)' wiki: '[btn.wiki](/)' friends: '[](/)' about: '[](/)' Copy ``` ### fancybox selectorHTML ``` tale/_config.ymltag_plugins: # {% image %} image: fancybox: true # true, false parse_markdown: true # markdown ######## JS Plugins ######## plugins: # https://fancyapps.com/docs/ui/fancybox/ # available for {% image xxx %} fancybox: enable: true #js: /customize/js/fancybox.umd.js css: /customize/css/fancybox.css js: https://fastly.jsdelivr.net/npm/@fancyapps/ui@4.0/dist/fancybox.umd.js #css: https://fastly.jsdelivr.net/npm/@fancyapps/ui@4.0/dist/fancybox.css # iframe # twikoo: .tk-content img:not([class*="emo"]) # waline: #waline_container .vcontent img selector: .swiper-slide img, .md-text.content p>img, .md-text.content li img , .wl-content img, .image-bg img # #selector: .swiper-slide img # Copy ``` ## ### ``` tale/_config.stellar.ymlfooter: social: QQ: icon: '' url: https://wpa.qq.com/msgrd?v=3&uin=1119716380&site=qq&menu=yes&jumpflag=1 github: icon: '' url: https://github.com/z23654262 #iconfont: # icon: '' # url: https://www.iconfont.cn/ unsplash: icon: '' url: https://unsplash.com/@z23654262 train: icon: '' url: https://unsplash.com/@z23654262 Moon: icon: '' url: javaScript:void(''); Sun: icon: '' url: javaScript:void(''); #AI: # icon: '' # url: javaScript:void(''); Copy ``` ### ``` tale/source/_data/widget,ymlwelcome: layout: markdown title: 'SFZhang' content: |

yiyan: layout: markdown title: '' content: |

timeline: layout: timeline title: api: https://api.github.com/repos/z23654262/blog-life/issues?per_page=10 # api?per_page=11 user: # hide: # title,footer # # Stellar v1.13.0 ghuser: layout: ghuser username: z23654262 # your github login username avatar: true # show avatar or not menu: true # show menu or not # search_blog: layout: search filter: /blog/ # or /posts/ ... placeholder: search_all_docs: layout: search filter: /wiki/ placeholder: search_docs: layout: search filter: auto placeholder: Copy ``` ## ### ### ``` tale/_config.stellar.ymlpost-index: # and ... '': /life Copy ``` ### ``` tale/node_modules/hexo-theme-stellar/layout/_partial/main/navbar/list_post.ejsif (full_url_for(page.path) == full_url_for(obj[key])) Copy ``` ``` tale/node_modules/hexo-theme-stellar/layout/_partial/main/navbar/list_post.ejsif (full_url_for(page.path) == full_url_for(obj[key]) + '/index.html') Copy ``` ### githubissue ![img](https://bu.dusays.com/2023/10/10/6525053ada517.png) ### ``` tale/source/life/index.md--- title: menu_id: post # breadcrumb: false # post_list: true # date: 2023-10-10 10:34:34 --- {% note color:orange %} {% timeline api:https://api.github.com/repos/z23654262/blog-life/issues?direction=asc&per_page=30 %}{% endtimeline %} Copy ``` ### ![img](https://bu.dusays.com/2023/10/10/6525053c629b0.png) ## giscus ### github blog-commentsDiscussions**blog-comments/Settings/Features/Discussions** ### ``` tale/_config.stellar.ymlcomments: service: giscus # giscus # https://giscus.app/zh-CN giscus: data-repo: xxx/xxx # [] data-repo-id: # [ ID] data-category: # [] data-category-id: data-mapping: pathname data-strict: 0 data-reactions-enabled: 1 data-emit-metadata: 0 data-input-position: top # top, bottom data-theme: preferred_color_scheme data-lang: zh-CN data-loading: lazy crossorigin: anonymous Copy ``` ### giscus ![img](https://bu.dusays.com/2023/10/10/652506ecef464.png) githubDiscussions ![img](https://bu.dusays.com/2023/10/10/65250743df7b0.png) ## waline [waline](https://waline.js.org/guide/get-started/) walinevercellearncloudwaline.sfzhang.top ### learncloud 1. [](https://console.leancloud.app/login) [](https://console.leancloud.app/register) `LeanCloud ` [](https://console.leancloud.app/apps) 2. `` () ![img](https://bu.dusays.com/2023/10/25/653934aa64f92.png) 3. `` > ` Key` `APP ID`,`APP Key` `Master Key` ![img](https://bu.dusays.com/2023/10/25/653934abc41c2.png) ### vercel 1. [Vercel](https://vercel.com/new/clone?repository-url=https://github.com/walinejs/waline/tree/main/example) Vercel Server github 2. walineVercel ![img](https://bu.dusays.com/2023/10/25/653939ea76abe.png) 3. `Settings` - `Environment Variables` `LEAN_ID`, `LEAN_KEY` `LEAN_MASTER_KEY` LeanCloud `APP ID`, `APP KEY`, `Master Key` ![img](https://bu.dusays.com/2023/10/25/653939ec3590b.png) 4. `Deployments` `Redeploy` ![img](https://bu.dusays.com/2023/10/25/653939edb10db.png) 5. `Overview` `STATUS` `Ready` `Visit` ### Vercel 1. `Settings` - `Domains` ![img](https://bu.dusays.com/2023/10/25/653939ef268d9.png) 2. ![img](https://bu.dusays.com/2023/10/25/653939f04aa4b.png) ### ``` tale/_config.staller.yml######## Comments ######## comments: service: waline # beaudar, utterances, giscus, twikoo, waline, artalk # Waline # https://waline.js.org/ waline: js: https://unpkg.com/@waline/client@2.14.1/dist/waline.js css: https://unpkg.com/@waline/client@2.14.1/dist/waline.css # Waline server address url, you should set this to your own link serverURL: https://domain # If false, comment count will only be displayed in post page, not in home page commentCount: true # Pageviews count, Note: You should not enable both `waline.pageview` and `leancloud_visitors`. pageview: false # Custom emoji # emoji: # - https://unpkg.com/@waline/emojis@1.1.0/weibo # - https://unpkg.com/@waline/emojis@1.1.0/alus # - https://unpkg.com/@waline/emojis@1.1.0/bilibili # - https://unpkg.com/@waline/emojis@1.1.0/qq # - https://unpkg.com/@waline/emojis@1.1.0/tieba # - https://unpkg.com/@waline/emojis@1.1.0/tw-emoji # - https://unpkg.com/@waline/emojis@1.1.0/bmoji # Base 64 # imageUploader: # V1V2 # V1 # fileName: file # tokenName: Authorization # api: https://xxxxxx/api/v1/upload # token: Bearer xxxxxxxxxxxxxx # resp: data.links.url # V2 # fileName: image # tokenName: token # api: https://xxxxxx/api/upload # token: xxxxxxxxxxxxxx # resp: data.url # fileName: # # tokenName: # # api: # api # token: # # resp: # ```
